default_config.nats:
# ================================== Outputs ===================================
output.http:
  # Vector HTTP 接收地址（默认本地）
  hosts: ["localhost:8080"]
  path: "/logs"
  method: POST
  timeout: 30s

  # 默认认证（与Vector默认配置匹配）
  username: "${node.ip}"
  password: "${node.ip}-${node.cloud_region}"

  # 性能优化配置
  worker: 1
  max_retries: 3
  batch.events: 50
  batch.timeout: 1s

# ============================== Filebeat inputs ===============================
filebeat.inputs:
